thread_replies.author: 黒たまご
thread_replies.text: これはリバー流れないでよ、の後に連続して観たのですが、タイムリープ作品でもこんなに違うんだと比較自体が楽しかったので、2作連続視聴お薦めします。

thread_replies.text: これおもろかった

thread_replies.text: Learn the fundamentals of AI-powered coding to make the most out of your development workflow.

thread_replies.text: 見たよー良かった。部長の思いに胸が熱くなった

thread_replies.author: Yuk-s
thread_replies.text:
『MONDAYS/このタイムループ、上司に気づかせないと終わらない』ほんと面白いです！
タイムリープもの好きには特に堪らない映画だと思います！

thread_replies.text: This is really funny

thread_replies.author: Apex
thread_replies.text:
That sounds super interesting...!   
Just the premise of a black company × time loop setup alone seems like it'll bring laughter and empathy at the same time. Being able to watch it quickly on Netflix is the best too

thread_replies.author: 花嫁修行ちゃん
thread_replies.text:
The most relatable one ⤵︎  
The body type of 80% of girls! Totally this!

Honestly, once you use this, you can't go back to other powders.
Even for those who struggle with powders due to dry skin, it's moisturizing enough to use,
yet it reliably absorbs the sebum from oily skin.

thread_replies.text:
The broadcast has been suspended due to the scheduling of an emergency special program.
Regarding the broadcast on 12/8,
it was scheduled to air two weeks in advance,
and we are currently making adjustments.

Once the details are finalized,
we will make another announcement.

thread_replies.author: Larian Studios
thread_replies.text:
Built by the team who brought you Baldur's Gate 3, Larian Studios unchains its ambitions to bring you an RPG with greater breadth & depth than ever before.

Divinity - The gods are silent. Rivellon bleeds. New powers stir.

thread_replies.author: I'm_Nuella
thread_replies.text:
This year too, I dumped Hokkyoku soup into ankake and concocted the sweetest and spiciest food in Japan.
Drank it all with ease, way too delicious

thread_replies.author: timeleszファミリア【日本テレビ】
thread_replies.text:
The broadcast has been suspended due to the scheduling of an emergency special program.
Regarding the broadcast on 12/8,
it was scheduled to air two weeks in advance,
and we are currently making adjustments.

Once the details are finalized,
we will make another announcement.

thread_replies.author: Larian Studios
thread_replies.text:
Built by the team who brought you Baldur's Gate 3, Larian Studios unchains its ambitions to bring you an RPG with greater breadth & depth than ever before.

Divinity - The gods are silent. Rivellon bleeds. New powers stir.

tweets.author: 【公式】タイムレスマン
tweets.text:
The broadcast of "Quiz DE Motetai Man - Complete Edition-"
How was it? 

Next time, the broadcast is on December 16th (Tue) 24:25~! 

Is Gen DE Yoshitaka also making a dynamic appearance!? 
Everyone, look forward to it!!

Missed episodes are available on TVer!

tweets.text:

Comment video has arrived

the three of them in a different way than usual?
／

12/19(fri)#Ikebukuro HUMAX Cinemas,
#Shinjuku Balt 9 and other locations nationwide roadshow
